methods.promoteOrphans:
Convert a table with orphans to one without.

:param table: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) - the input table to operate on
:param idColumn: (java.lang.String) - the column containing each row's unique ID
:param parentColumn: (java.lang.String) - the column containing the parent for this row; null for top-level rows
:return: (io.deephaven.db.tables.Table) a table where parentColumn is null if the original parent did not appear in the IDs

text:
Identify orphan rows in a table destined for conversion into a tree table, and mask their parent column value to
 null, so that they show up at the top level of the hierarchy.
 

 This is useful if your data contains values which you can not identify as top-level rows; or if you would like to
 filter your tree table source, excluding parents which do not meet your filter criteria, but do not want to orphan
 the matches.
 

 This class should be used by calling promoteOrphans(Table, String, String) method.
